channel.title: Abouts on 三十重围
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on 三十重围

item.title: About
item.description:
没错这是一首歌:

What if the storm ends and I don’t see you As you are now ever again? The perfect halo of gold hair and lightning Sets you off against the planet’s last dance

Just for a minute the silver-forked sky Lifts you up like a star that I will follow But now it’s found us like I have a found you I don’t wanna run, just overwhelm me

What if the storm ends? At least that’s nothing Except the memory, a distant echo I won’t pin down I’ve walked unsettled rattle cage after cage Until my blood boils

I wanna see you as you are now Every single day that I am living Painted in flames, a peeling thunder Be the lightning in me that strikes relentless

What if the storm ends and I don’t see you As you are now ever again? The perfect halo of gold hair and lightning Sets you off against the planet’s last dance

Just for a minute the silver-forked sky Lifts you up like a star that I will follow But now it’s found us like I have a found you I don’t wanna run, just overwhelm me
